summary: NullReferenceException when attempting to travel after completing all available planets
description: After completing Region 3 and the final cryo sequence, the game attempts to auto-travel to a non-existent next destination, triggering a NullReferenceException.
steps: 3. Wait for the automatic travel logic to engage.
expected: Game should handle the end of content gracefully (e.g., return to menu, show 'To Be Continued' message).
actual: NullReferenceException: 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object' 'No destination region for portal target' appears.
